oracle.cdc.my_table.5m.sql: SELECT ID, NAME, VALUE, UPDATED_AT FROM CDC_TEST.MY_TABLE WHERE UPDATED_AT > TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND UPDATED_AT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') ORDER BY UPDATED_AT
